amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 119-462 to prohibit funds for certain community funding projects.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits funds for certain community funding projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 136 - 291 (Roll no. 44).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 136 - 291 (Roll no. 44).
